text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Today is the day.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Well then, trainers, let me hear your<n>answers. Why do you
wish to be my<n>trainer?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I'll kick things off. As I said the other<n>day, I guarantee you'll
become even<n>stronger under my tutelage—strong<n>enough
to stand on that podium as a<n>champion.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
This is a three-year training plan. I put<n>all the knowledge and
effort I could<n>muster into it.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Superb. Even just glancing at it, I can<n>tell that it's a well
thought out plan. I'll<n>take a closer look shortly.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Next would be...

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Me, yes. It's true that you have<n>boundless potential—so
much so that<n>some trainers are hesitant to work<n>with you.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: But I want to see you fulfill yourpotential. I'm prepared to do whateverit takes to guide you to certain victory!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I've laid out a report with winning<n>race strategies based on
an analysis<n>of your runs. Please take a look!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hmm... Impressive work. I'll look at it<n>in more detail shortly.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
And now... Last but not least, I turn to<n>you. Why do you wish
to be my<n>trainer?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
You said you wanted to see more of<n>my running. In other
words, you spoke<n>of your belief in my future potential.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Illustrate to me, please, what that<n>would entail. What future
would you<n>seek for me?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In response to her question, I show<n>her the photo I took
yesterday.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Is this... a photograph of me?<n>When I brought Grass
Wonder and<n>Maruzensky together?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: So this... is the answer you brought<n>for me?
choice_data_list: This is the future I wish to seek with you.
This is the future I wish to seek with you.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: ...I see. With me, huh?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After that, Symboli Rudolf carefully<n>reads the documents put
together by<n>the other trainers.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: But ultimately...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry to turn you both down like<n>this after you put in so
much work.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: ...A tremendous pity, but I understand.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
We'll leave the rest to you. Help her<n>achieve
greatness—we're holding you<n>to that.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The two trainers look back regretfully<n>as they make their
way off the track.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
They were excellent trainers. Any<n>student would flourish
under their<n>guidance.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Why did I choose you? Isn't it<n>obvious?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
You made an effort to look at the<n>world from my
perspective. And that...<n>made me happier than I expected.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
What I aim for, every day of my life, is<n>to create a world
where Umamusume<n>can live in bliss. That's what I've<n>
been running full-speed toward this<n>entire time.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But, well... I think there was a part of<n>myself that considered
it a naïve,<n>faraway dream.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But you're different! I could tell you<n>were willing to go the
extra mile, but I<n>didn't expect someone who shared<n>the
same vision!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Knowing that brings me so much joy.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Having someone who shares my<n>aspirations—who would
seek this<n>future with me by my side... it fills my<n>heart with
a reassuring warmth.
choice_data_list:
I'm the one who's thrilled to have you by my
side.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Turning the tables on me, are you?<n>Hahaha! I'm flattered
that you feel<n>that way!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Well then—let's make it official, shall<n>we?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I am Symboli Rudolf. I stand here at<n>the starting gate with
my eyes on one<n>goal: a world where all Umamusume<n>can
live in bliss.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But idle talk won't get me anywhere.<n>I must back my words
with deeds<n>worthy of attention and respect.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
That is why I am aiming for the<n>top—so that I may be a ruler
worthy of<n>her crown.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Much time has passed since I first<n>came to the academy. I
spent my days<n>serving as the student council<n>president,
but now the hour is nigh.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Will you help me take the throne,<n>Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Excellent. That's what I wanted to<n>hear! We'll make the
name Symboli<n>Rudolf one to remember.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Both of us, together.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Time passed quickly after that.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Soon enough, the day of Symboli<n>Rudolf's debut race is
upon us, and<n>before I know it...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Thank you for your cheers and<n>well-wishes, everyone!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Yeaaaaaah! Woooo!!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Rudolf—what a powerhouse!<n>Such an exceptional
performance!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
This victory is surely only the<n>beginning of her blazing path
to glory!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: ...High praise indeed.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Heh, looks like we both have great<n>expectations to live up
to!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her smile spreads to the people in the<n>stands, capturing
countless fans—and<n>this is still only the first race of her<n>
journey!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: S-so cool!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: So that's... Symboli Rudolf!
